summary: Core multi-page scaffold with TanStack Router, shared layout (TopNav + Footer), and youth-oriented theme/typography is implemented. Home hero section references the requested generated hero image and the logo is referenced in nav/footer. However, the diff summary does not show the required generated image files under frontend/public/assets/generated, and some navigation links (in Footer) use plain anchors which likely cause full page reloads, conflicting with SPA navigation requirements. Several authentication/actor hooks and Internet Identity integration appear added but were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Navigation works without full page reloads.
missing_requirements.reason: Footer 'Quick Links' uses plain <a href="/..."> anchors rather than router Links, which typically triggers full page reloads in an SPA.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames (youth-logo.dim_512x512.png, youth-hero.dim_1600x900.png, youth-icons.dim_768x256.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references /assets/generated/youth-logo.dim_512x512.png and /assets/generated/youth-hero.dim_1600x900.png, but the diff summary does not show any files added under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor evidence of the specified filenames being added as static assets. (One added file was omitted due to limits, but no path/filename evidence is provided.)

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hook and identity-aware actor creation via React Query.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for authentication, Internet Identity integration, or actor/identity hooks; non-goals include member management features.
BuildRequest focuses on frontend pages and static assets; backend changes should be minimal unless required. An empty actor file is added without an evident need from the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media icon buttons/links in the footer (Facebook/Instagram/X).
hallucinated_features.reason: External integrations were listed as non-goals; while these are only placeholder links (#), they implement social media UI that was not requested.
